content: On the game’s first possession, Gordon Hayward curled around a screen from Rudy Gobert. Hayward’s defender — Luc Mbah a Moute, losing ground and trying to cut tightly around the pick — made knee-to-knee contact with Gobert. Hayward, seeing that the left side of the court had now been cleared for Gobert, threw a pass in his direction. But the star center was already on the ground clutching his knee.
